3.4.20  7:21 pm   if the 9th in a maj9 chord is the 9th degree of the ionian mode,

     or the second

      is the 9th in a min9 chord the 9th degree of the aeolian mode or what? 

     sure, or the second

3.4.20  7:20 pm   When will you post another video? 

     i am having a count down timer

3.4.20  5:40 pm   any updates on that rocket you're building?

     looks like i'm gonna have to build most of it after it's already been launched. preparing for launch now

3.4.20  5:23 pm   What is your opinion on snakes?

     every snake might be 2 snakes. i'm really not sure

3.4.20  5:15 pm   Why do tubas exist? 

     to get low bass notes, before the age of electronics

3.4.20  5:13 pm   How can I do ear training? Is this something you can do?

     i'm sure you can find a nearly unlimited amount of practice resources online

3.4.20  5:06 pm   Got any books you recommend? Fiction or nonfiction, anything works, but if you have a philosophical one, I would be most interested in that. 

     do they still make books

3.4.20  4:02 pm   Why do giants move slowly?

     they actually move pretty fast but it looks slow because their body is bigger

3.4.20  3:43 pm   I was thinking about going on a chord voicing journey and making a list with fun descriptive names for my favorite voicings. Does this sound like a good idea or does the emotion I hear from them depend more on context so that anything I try to define now would be rendered useless when making an actual song/transcribing?

     if you are in the mood to do it then i think you should do it. you will definitely learn something one way or another. that reminds me of the time i decided to change the name of Db, Eb, Gb, Ab, and Bb to J, K, Q, R, and S. one of the main things i learned there was that i'm not going to do that anymore. but i wouldn't have been able to learn that unless i did it

3.4.20  3:23 pm   Can I get the original chord demo for "throw away the garbage pail"?

     sure

3.4.20  2:46 pm   thoughts on banana pizza?

     the original banana is pointy, then it is sliced into round pieces, which are placed on a round pizza which is sliced and becomes pointy again. and so the circle of life unfolds

3.4.20  2:16 pm   what are some good repetitive songs?

     feliz navidad

3.4.20  2:00 pm   how do I choose between science and art when everyone is asking me to?

     very obediently but that's not what i would recommend in this case

3.4.20  1:43 pm   Hi Bill, I'm the one that hates school, it's not a great period here in Italy and I thought I might as well be friendly and say that your songs are helping me distract myself a lot from this absurd situation.
Ok, here's the question: when you create a song, do you already have a topic or theme in mind or do you go with the flow?

     if i'm going to create a song as in 'record' a song, .... i need a lot more than a theme, the whole song needs to be written first. i would love to improvise songs, but that is pretty much only possible if you have only 1 instrument per person. and a very good relationship between all of those people

     I noticed that at times one of my best drawings are done on the spot, do you think it's better to plan things ahead or just go and do them? Oops that's two questions 

     always plan things out. just kidding, never plan anything, always improvise. i have an update to this: some things are better planned out and some things are good improvised. examples of things that are better improvised: a friendly conversation. examples of things that are better to be not improvised: a commercial airline

3.4.20  1:20 pm   out of all the songs you've posted so far, which one is your favorite and why?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite, and post it also

3.4.20  1:20 pm   how do you sing without getting nervous?

     you are excited

3.4.20  1:13 pm   Any thoughts on velcro?

     it's good but i hate it

3.4.20  12:38 pm   have you tried making music with objects that dont classify as instruments

     yes, but i have some special news, i can't find the classification committee, and i think they all went out to lunch. so that means it's classify your own instrument day

3.4.20  12:30 pm   How do you think of chord progressions

     there has to be a context. something has to be happening. even if you are walking down the street, you need to be going somewhere. or if not, something needs to have happened yesterday which you are thinking about. or if not, something needs to be potentially happening tomorrow, for you to be thinking about. maybe it's quinoa world and you are just seeing quinoa world for the first time. the music needs to be contextualized somehow, i don't care how you do it.

3.4.20  12:27 pm   What is Europe?

     it's like an island ...... attached to asia

3.4.20  12:25 pm   what is your opinion on communism 

     i just like the merch

3.4.20  12:05 pm   what is the edge of the universe made out of? bread perhaps?

     you

3.4.20  11:48 am   i discover something new whenever I listen to your music. do you discover anything when making new songs?

     extremely yes

3.4.20  11:36 am   What's the countdown timer at for the video after your next video

     17

3.4.20  11:29 am   how do i write meaningless lyrics without changing the topic of the original idea?

     you could try using a meaningless topic

3.4.20  11:17 am   are we alive?

     oh that would explain a lot

3.4.20  11:09 am   hey bill, after a long time of me not feeling confident enough in my material to record it, i'm finally giving it a shot. just wanted to know if you have any good tips when it comes ro recording music?

     can't give any tips until you've tried it at least once. because trying it is harmless and it will then reveal much more information about next strategies to try. let me know how it goes

      also, do you think i'm better off just finishing as many songs as i can or should i try to focus on making the songs as good as they can be?

     won't know yet what's going on until you try 1

     thanks a lot for everything, you're awesome:)

3.4.20  11:02 am   whens the next video

     i am having a count down timer

3.4.20  10:48 am   The bass rundown at 2:18 on La De Da De Da De Da De Day Oh is one of the most satisfying things, isn't it?

     i don't remember which one that is. it's kind of a pesky habit i have. i am thankful if it doesn't ruin the song. "the goal is to not ruin the song", that's my motto

3.4.20  10:35 am   How do you recover after failing an interview for a scholarship. I feel horrible. 

     harness this rage as energy to make your own school. then you can be the one giving the scholarships

3.4.20  10:19 am   What is the shape of the Earth?

     huge

3.4.20  10:09 am   Hi Bill, Hope all is going well. If you could summarize your current feelings with a quote from The Simpsons, what would it be?

     side show bob stepping on a bunch of rakes

3.4.20  9:16 am   How many cats do you eat a year

     not sure. according to science i only do it in my sleep

3.4.20  7:50 am   Do you think everyone died in 2012?

     no, that's actually when a lot of people were born. which is the opposite of dying

3.4.20  7:49 am   has money become too important in modern society?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.4.20  7:49 am   if tomatoes are fruits, is ketchup a smoothie?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.4.20  6:24 am   why are the songs in 90s so damn cool

     because songs any time are so damn cool

3.4.20  6:04 am   do you like palm trees?

     yes

3.4.20  5:46 am   i have to learn any band instrument for highschool, which would you recommend (i was thinking trombone)

     hm, i wonder if you can be the composer

3.4.20  4:59 am   i think i was born with a zany, sort of isolating childhood personality. then I had to start learning how to be a real person that wouldn't make my parents/teachers upset. i need to write music now and i know the only way is to get that personality back, but i am having a hard time... thoughts

     what have you tried so far

3.4.20  3:44 am   Why aren't the hi, I'm Steve songs not on the songs page?

     because they would be totally out of context when played without the surrounding content. they are not songs, it's more like the whole video is the song, but even for that the video has to be there. unlike the 'music videos' which are supposed to be able to function just fine without the video

3.4.20  3:21 am   favorite kind of fruit?

     potato

3.4.20  2:56 am   do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky?

     no, we actually were. still are i think

3.4.20  1:42 am   3.3.20  3:30 am hey bill, thanks for answering.see i'm in my second year of college, and obviously that's not a place where you want to be lazy, but i have managed to just slip by in grades with some luck and the help of classmates. the point is; i always end up doing things at the last moment, were it be studying for a test or doing homework, i always do them at the last day, at the last hour, but somehow, i have managed to survive, just survive. and now the thing is i don't want to keep doing that, i don't want to be so lazy.

     there is no such thing as lazy. if you feel no energy to do something that means you are not getting why it could be so gosh damn much fun. and maybe there is actually no way for it to be fun but i would be skeptical of that because most things are fun, but the trick is you need to unlock the fun. often in your own entirely unique way. and if you haven't figured out how to do that, then it's going to be extremely extremely unappealing to you. like so unappealing it will be completely impossible to move forward with it. so as i said, there is no such thing is 'lazy', it just means you haven't figured out how much fun the thing could be

      i have lots of free days and spare time and i know i should use that free time studying or doing my homework, but i just don't want to do either of them, because doing something i don't want to just makes me feel awful, almost miserable, like i'm being forced into doing something i hate.

     right, that is nature's way of saying don't do bad stuff. pretty handy how it says that

     but at the same time i know i should not feel that way and i should be more responsible .

     doing bad stuff is not responsible. the question is, is the thing actually good and you just haven't unlocked its creamy goodness

      sorry for the long answer, but short answer to your question, what i want to do if i weren't so lazy is study and do my homework in my free time instead of doing nothing.

     hm ... i thought you said you hated it and didn't want to do it

3.4.20  1:15 am   what happens if you eat 13 IKEA chairs

     nothing. don't do it

3.4.20  1:13 am   Bill, what language do the trees speak where you are?

     earth

     yes but not right now

     no
